Home.heading: Project Cicaeda

Home.mlAnalysisDescription: Advanced machine learning analytics to track health patterns over time
Home.ckdPredictionDescription: Accurate prediction of chronic kidney disease risk factors
Home.ctaDescription: Begin your health journey today with our comprehensive questionnaire

Questionnaire1.heading: Fill The Below Input
Questionnaire1.question3: What city do you live in?

Questionnaire2.heading: Fill The Below Input
Questionnaire2.subHeading: Enter your medical-related data for the below questions.
Questionnaire2.question4: Do you have high blood pressure (HBP)?

Questionnaire3.heading: Fill The Below Input
Questionnaire3.subHeading: Enter your medical-related data for the below questions.
Questionnaire3.question3: Do you have a history of heart attack or stroke?
Questionnaire3.question4: Do you have a history of congestive heart failure?

Questionnaire4.heading: Fill The Below Input
Questionnaire4.subHeading: Enter your medical-related data for the below questions.
Questionnaire4.question1: Do you have a family history of kidney disease?
Questionnaire4.question2: Do you have protein in your urine?
Questionnaire4.question3: Do you experience foamy or bubbly urine?
Questionnaire4.question4: Do you frequently wake up at night to urinate?

Questionnaire5.heading: Fill The Below Input
Questionnaire5.question1: Do you have frequent swelling in your legs, ankles, or feet?
Questionnaire5.question2: Do you often feel tired or have low energy levels?
Questionnaire5.question3: Do you have difficulty concentrating or experience brain fog?
Questionnaire5.question4: Have you had unexplained weight loss recently?

LowRisk.risk: No significant risks detected. Maintain a healthy diet and hydration.
LowRisk.hydration: You are well hydrated. Keep up the good work!
LowRisk.lifestyle: Maintain a healthy lifestyle with a balanced diet and regular exercise.
LowRisk.medication: No medications required. Keep up the good work!

HighRisk.risk: High blood pressure and sugar levels detected. Consult a doctor immediately.
HighRisk.hydration: Your hydration is low. Increase water intake to at least 2.5L daily.
HighRisk.lifestyle: Reduce sodium and processed foods immediately. Regular check-ups are necessary.
HighRisk.medication: Strictly adhere to prescribed medications. Set daily reminders.

ModerateRisk.risk: Mild risks detected. Keep an eye on your blood pressure and sugar levels.
ModerateRisk.hydration: You're not drinking enough water daily. Increase to 2L for better kidney function.
ModerateRisk.lifestyle: Start incorporating kidney-friendly foods like fresh fruits and lean proteins.
ModerateRisk.medication: If prescribed, follow up with your doctor about your medication routine.ed
